summary: Danni is the first Sposato daughter to marry; that is, if her three wild sisters don't first tear the family apart. Niki, Chrissy and Toni return home for the long overdue Italian-style family reunion, and quickly try to one-up the other.
cast: Amanda Detmer|Sean Patrick Flanery|Brooke Langton|Monet Mazur|Alyssa Milano|Vanessa Parise|Johnathon Schaech|Talia Shire|Johnny Whitworth|Burt Young|Frances Bay|Rocco Olivo|Ric Mancini|Lillian Adams|Vanna Salviati|Jo Deodato Clark|Jeremy Parise|Charlie O'Connell|John O'Leary|Donna D'Errico|Rebecca Wackler|Portia Dawson|Elisa Leonetti|Jennifer Claire|Carol Stanzione|Steve McCammon|Frank D'Amico|Francesca Catalano|Alyssa Altman|Norman Todd
title: Puedes besar a la novia
